name: Hanza Hotel
description: Hotel Hanza is a 4-star property located in the heart of Old Town Gdańsk, at the picturesque Motława River. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. The hotel features access to fitness centre and a wellness centre with a sauna and three massage rooms offering a choice of treatments using eco-cosmetics A varied buffet breakfast is served every morning at the hotel restaurant, which specialises in Mediterranean dishes with elements of regional cuisine. Meals can also be enjoyed on the sun terrace overlooking the river. All elegant rooms at the Hanza come with a seating area and a 32-inch LCD TV. Each has a minibar, tea and coffee making facilities, and a bathroom with a hairdryer and free cosmetics. Upon request, bathrobes are available. Guests can relax in the Hanza's wellness centre with a sauna and massage treatments. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can arrange laundry and ironing services. Hotel Hanza is situated next to the famous Crane and a yacht marina. It takes only a 5-minute walk to reach beautiful Saint Mary’s Church.

name: Mile Gdansk Airport
description: Mile Gdansk Airport features garden views, free WiFi and free private parking, located in Gdańsk-Rębiechowo, 10 km from Oliwa Zoo. There is a fully equipped private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. Guests at the bed and breakfast can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Guests can also relax in the garden. Gdansk Zaspa is 10 km from Mile Gdansk Airport, while Oliwa Cathedral is 11 km away. The nearest airport is Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa Airport, 3 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Vesper House
description: Located in Gdańsk, 2.2 km from Gdansk Central Station, Hotel Vesper House features views of the city. With a bar, the 2-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Private parking is available on site. All units are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a shower, a hairdryer and a wardrobe. At the hotel every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available daily at Hotel Vesper House. European Solidarity Centre is 2 km from the accommodation, while St. Nicholas Roman Catholic Church is 2.8 km away. The nearest airport is Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa Airport, 10 km from Hotel Vesper House.

name: Radisson Red Gdansk
description: Located in Gdańsk, 300 metres from the centre and 700 metres from National Maritime Museum, Radisson RED Gdansk, Wyspa Spichrzów provides accommodation with amenities like free WiFi and flat-screen TV. A fridge is also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Polish Baltic Philharmonic, Green Gate and Long Bridge. The nearest airport is Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa Airport, 15 km from Radisson RED Gdansk, Wyspa Spichrzów.

name: Hotel Sadova
description: Offering a sauna and fitness centre, Hotel Sadova is situated in Gdańsk in the Pomerania Region, a 3-minute walk from Marina Gdańsk. The hotel has an indoor pool, and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property and private parking is available on site. Every room is equipped with a flat-screen TV. The rooms include a private bathroom. Extras include free toiletries and a hair dryer. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Green Gate is a 5-minute walk from Hotel Sadova, while Central Maritime Museum is 700 metres away. The nearest airport is Gdansk Lech Walesa Airport, 13 km from Hotel Sadova.

name: Jess Hotel Krolewski Gdansk Old Town
description: Located on Ołowianka Island, which lies between the Motława Waterfront and the Stępka Channel, Jess Hotel Krolewski Gdansk Old Town offers rooms near Gdańsk’s Old Town. The hotel consists of two buildings - the main building where the Reception and Restaurant are located and a building which was completed in September 2019 with rooms marked as Annex. The building is located 80 metres from the main building. Free Wi-Fi is available at the entire hotel, and the hotel features a private parking that consists of 50 parking spaces. The Królewski’s rooms have wooden furniture, which includes a work desk. All have a cable TV and a minibar. Some rooms feature a view of the Medieval waterfront. In the mornings a breakfast buffet is available. Later the hotel’s restaurant serves Polish dishes. The staff is at guests’ disposal 24/7 and can help guests organise sightseeing tours and taxi transfers. The island itself has several points of interest, such as the Maritime Museum, the Baltic Philharmonic and the Gdańsk Marina. All are within 150 metres. Długi Targ is located 850 metres away from Królewski, which is the heart of the old town. Gdańsk Główny Train Station is 2.2 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Wolne Miasto
description: The 3-star Hotel Wolne Miasto Old Town Gdańsk is located in the historic centre of the city, just 600 metres from Gdańsk Główny Railway Station. It offers comfortable rooms with free WiFi. Paid public parking is available. Each spacious and elegantly furnished room features a fully-equipped marble bathroom, a flat-screen TV and a private safe. There is free mineral water in each room. Rooms in the Deluxe category offer tea and coffee-making facilities. The hotel’s restaurant specialises in traditional Polish dishes. Wolne Miasto Hotel’s attentive staff is at guests’ disposal 24 hours a day and will gladly offer tips on what to do and see in Gdańsk. Lech Walesa International Airport is located 15 km from the hotel. Major museums, restaurants and cafes can be found within a short walking distance.

name: Hilton Gdansk
description: Welcome to the Hilton Gdansk hotel, overlooking the Motlawa River in the heart of the Old Town and just 10 miles from Gdansk Lech Walesa Airport. Explore popular Gdansk attractions like the Central Maritime Museum, the cobbled gothic Mariacka Street and St Mary’s Church, Europe’s largest brick-built church. This Gdansk hotel is perfectly situated to enjoy a range of leisure activities including golf, tennis, horseback riding, kayaking and cycling. Take in stunning views of the Old Town from the modern and spacious Guest Rooms at the Hilton Gdansk hotel. Choose a Deluxe Room to enjoy views of the Motlawa River from the large windows. All rooms at the Hilton Gdansk hotel boast 32-inch LCD TVs and wireless internet access. Dine in style in Mercato Restaurant at the Hilton Gdansk hotel or enjoy drinks at the F32 Lobby Lounge. The High 5 Terrace Bar - the highest bar in the Old Town - offers the perfect backdrop to relax with a glass of wine and admire the views of Gdansk. Located in the Old Town business district and with one of the largest meetings and event facilities in Gdansk, the Hilton Gdansk hotel offers 5 flexible meeting rooms for up to 500 guests. A 24-hour business center, wireless internet access and professional banquet staff ensure that every event at this Gdansk hotel is a success. *The swimming pool will be closed from 17th until 21st of December 2018 for essential maintenance works. We apologize for the inconvenience.*Hilton

name: Hotel Urbi
description: Situated in Gdańsk, 9.3 km from Gdansk Zaspa, Hotel Urbi features accommodation with a terrace, free private parking and a bar. This 2-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 10 km from Green Gate. All rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, fridge, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. The rooms are fitted with a safety deposit box and some rooms also boast city views. Guest rooms have a private bathroom, a hairdryer and bed linen. A continental breakfast is available each morning at the hotel. Long Bridge is 10 km from Hotel Urbi, while St. Nicholas Roman Catholic Church is 10 km from the property. The nearest airport is Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa Airport, 7 km from the accommodation.

name: Dom Muzyka
description: Dom Muzyka is located in Gdańsk, just 800 metres from Długi Targ Street, the heart of Gdańsk’s Old Town. Housed in a 19th century building, its rooms have private bathrooms with showers. The rooms at Dom Muzyka are done in bright colours and have high ceilings and tall arched windows. Apart from a work desk, each has a satellite TV and offers free Wi-Fi. There is a free spacious car park within the enclosed estate where Dom Muzyka is situated. Meals are served in Dom Muzyka’s Harmonia Restaurant. It focuses international, French, Italian and traditional Polish dishes. Breakfast is available in the mornings. The property is conveniently located. The Medieval port crane on the Motława waterfront is 1 km away. Gdańsk Główny Railway Station is within 2.1 km. Dom Muzyka’s helpful staff is prepared to assist guests 24/7. There are concerts organised at the nearby Music Academy which guests may attend free of charge.

name: Baltic Gdansk Old Town
description: Baltic Gdansk OLD TOWN is set in the centre of Gdańsk, close to Neptune Fountain, Long Market and Main Town Hall. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property and private parking is available on site. The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The daily breakfast offers à la carte, continental or Full English/Irish options. Guests at the aparthotel can enjoy hiking nearby, or benefit from the sun terrace. Popular points of interest near Baltic Gdansk OLD TOWN include Green Gate, St. Nicholas Roman Catholic Church and Long Bridge. The nearest airport is Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa, 14 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Faros
description: Situated in Gdańsk-Rębiechowo, only 1 km from Lech Wałęsa Airport and 15 km from Gdańsk Old Town, Hotel Faros features a restaurant and a bar, where guests can enjoy a meal and relax. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Free private parking is available on site. Every room is fitted with a flat-screen TV. Each room is fitted with a private bathroom. Extras include free toiletries and a hair dryer, as well as tea and coffee making set. At a surcharge, the hotel offers shuttle service. There is also a conference room. Sopot is 9 km from Hotel Faros, while Gdynia is 16 km from the property.

name: Apart Neptun
description: Located in the heart of Gdańsk Old Town, Apart Neptun offers high standard rooms and apartments with free Wi-Fi. Every room and apartment in Apart Neptun has a safe and a cooler, as well as an electric kettle. There is a flat-screen TV and a bathroom with a shower. The property boasts a spa centre where guests can enjoy a variety of massages. Other beauty treatments, including manicure and pedicure, are also possible. Apart Neptun has a 24-hour reception with a safe and luggage storage, as well as a tour desk that can arrange for a choice of sightseeing tours. There is also an airport shuttle available at extra charge. It is 1 km to Gdańsk Główny Train Station. It is 14 km to Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa Airport.

name: Hotel Villa Eva
description: Located in the Wrzeszcz disctrict of Gdańsk and surrounded by a garden, Villa Eva offers peaceful accommodation with easy access to the city’s main attractions. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. The rooms here will provide you with a flat-screen TV and cable channels. In each there also is a refrigerator, an electric kettle and a dining table. Featuring a shower, the private bathrooms also come with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Extras include a desk, a safety deposit box and ironing facilities. At Villa Eva you will find a 24-hour front desk, a garden and a terrace. Other facilities offered include luggage storage. Guests are welcome to dine in the on-site restaurant, featuring a wide selection of wines. The property is 750 metres from the Galeria Bałtycka Shopping Centre. The Gdańsk Wrzeszcz Train Station is 700 metres away. Villa Eva is 5 km from the Gdańsk Old Town.

name: Hampton by Hilton Gdansk Airport
description: The hotel is located just 200 meters from the Lech Walesa Gdansk Airport, 10 km from the center of Gdansk. - Modern hotel with free, 24-hour fitness center, restaurant, snack bar, conference room (up to 35 people) and business center - Air-conditioned guest rooms with comfy bed, TV and spacious work area - Free breakfast buffet - Free WiFi - Easy access to Gdansk, Gdynia and Sopot attractions – businesses, restaurants, shopping, leisure options.Hilton

name: Dworek Pani Walewska
description: Dworek Pani Walewska is located 10 km from Gdańsk’s Old Town, 1 km from the main ring road in Karczemki. It offers rooms with cable TV and free Wi-Fi. The rooms at the Dworek have a private bathroom with a shower cabin and toiletries. All are equipped with a work desk. The Pani Walewska Restaurant serves European cuisine. In the morning, buffet breakfast is offered. Dworek Pani Walewska is situated 4 km from the Gdańsk Airport. The nearest bus stop, offering excellent connections with central Gdańsk, is just 10 metres from the hotel.

name: Stay Inn Hotel Gdansk
description: Offering a restaurant, 3-star Stay inn Hotel Gdańsk is located in the heart of the Old Town of Gdańsk, opposite St. Mary’s Basilica. It offers modern, air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi access. Rooms here come with light-blocking curtains, and, private bathrooms with shower, hi-fi speakers and a hairdryer. You can enjoy city view from the room. Extras include a desk, a safety deposit box and bed linen. At Stay inn Hotel Gdańsk you will find a 24-hour front desk, a terrace with exterior furniture and hi-fi equipment, where guests can enjoy splendid views of the Old Town. The hotel is 170 metres from Artus Court and Neptune Fountain and 150 metres from Main Town Hall. Gdansk Lech Walesa Airport is 12 km away.

name: Scandic Gdansk
description: Scandic Gdansk is located close to the Old Town of Gdansk, just 800 metres from the famous Crane over Motlawa River. It offers soundproofed rooms with bathrooms, TVs and free WiFi. The gym is open 24 hours. Property also features a sauna. In front of the hotel there is an airport bus stop, from which you will get to the airport in just 20 minutes. The Central Railway Station is situated opposite Scandic Hotel. Ergo Arena is 8 km away. Senso Restaurant & Bar is a great place to meet with friends and taste snacks, European dishes and a wide selection of wines, teas and coffees. Here buffet breakfast is also served. You can enjoy alcoholic and soft drinks, as well as desserts and light meals in Scandic’s lobby bar.

name: Hampton by Hilton Gdansk Oliwa
description: Hampton by Hilton Gdansk Oliwa offers close proximity to the city’s business center and is easily accessible by car and public transport. A train station is located close by taking you to the historic landmarks of Gdansk city center and the nearby resort cities of Sopot and Gdynia. Feel at home in your guest room with such amenities as free WiFi, a comfy bed, work desk with ergonomic chair, a 40-inch HDTV and an alarm clock radio. We also offer accessible rooms with all the standard amenities plus a variety of accessible features. Our Gdansk hotel welcomes families with children and offers family rooms with sofa beds. A hot breakfast is included when you stay at our Gdansk Oliwa hotel. In the evening, enjoy a hearty dinner with classic Polish cuisine, plus wraps, sandwiches and burgers at the lobby bar. Stop by the 24-hour hub stocked with single serve drinks, confectionary and salty snacks. With our 24-hour fitness center equipped with cardio machines and free weights it is easy to keep up your exercise routine during your stay.Hilton

name: Ratusz B&B
description: Ratusz B&B offers accommodation set in Gdańsk, less than 1 km from Oliwa Cathedral and a 1-minute walk from Oliwski Park. Complimentary WiFi is provided. There is a private bathroom with shower and free toiletries in each unit. The bed and breakfast offers a sun terrace. Olivia Hall is 1.7 km from Ratusz B&B. The nearest airport is Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa Airport, 17 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Mercure Gdansk Stare Miasto
description: The Mercure Gdansk Stare Miasto hotel is ideal for guests looking for accommodation in the city center. Located very close to the Old Town Square and the city's magnificent monuments, the hotel offers 281 comfortable rooms of various types. As the highest building in Gdansk, it offers picturesque views over the Old Town and famous Gdansk Shipyard. The Winestone restaurant serves European cuisine and a wide selection of wines.accorhotels.com

name: Hampton by Hilton Gdansk Old Town
description: Located in the historic Old Town Square, Hampton by Hilton Gdansk Old Town offers modern rooms with free WiFi and secure underground parking. Our hotel puts you within walking distance of the fashionable Madison shopping center and many of the city’s attractions. The Neptune Monument is right on our doorstep. Take a stroll along the Royal Way to the Motlawa River promenade and explore the Old Town architecture, including St Mary’s Basilica and The Crane. For those travelling on business, our hotel is within easy reach of the business district and only 5km from the Amber Expo Exhibition and Conference center. The hotel offers two conference rooms with capacity for up to 100 guests, perfect for conferences, meetings or private celebrations. Local and national rail networks are within 10 minutes and Gdansk Lech Walesa Airport is only a 30 minute drive away. After a busy day, unwind in your spacious room with a clean and fresh Hampton bed™. Start your day with Hampton's included hot breakfast, offered to guests staying at the hotel. Later in the day, dine at our lobby bar with plenty of drink options as well as light meals and snacks. For a quick snack, stop by the 24/7 snack hub offering soft drinks, snacks and some travel essentials.Hilton

name: Ibb Hotel Gdansk
description: 4* hotel,located in the very heart of a historic part of Gdansk offers 89 rooms that have excellent interior design which is both modern and unpretentious but most of all cozy. Rooms are situated both in the historical part with the amazing view over Dugi Targ and in the built onto part that fis perfectly into the surrounding architecture.iHotelier/iStay

name: Smart Hotel
description: Hotel Smart is located in Gdańsk, in the lively Wrzeszcz district. It is a modern property surrounded by historic buildings. In close proximity there are shopping centers such as Galeria Bałtycka, popular restaurants, modern office buildings and business centers. All rooms and apartments come with a desk and a private bathroom that features a shower. Smart Hotel has a car park and a 24-hour front desk. Breakfast is served in the hotel restaurant. The property also provides meeting facilities and luggage storage. The facility is located close to the Gdańsk Wrzeszcz Railway Station (1.8 km). It provides easy access to Sopot, Gdynia and the center of Gdańsk (5.9 km). The distance to the Gdańsk Airport is 9 km.

name: Hotel Lival
description: Hotel Lival is just steps from the beach in Gdańsk Brzeźno and just 10- minute drive from the centre of Gdańsk. Each room has free internet access and sea views. The Lival Hotel provides comfortable accommodation. Free Nordic Walking equipment is provided, and deckchairs are available at extra charge. There also is a playground for children and a relaxing sauna. The restaurant serves buffet breakfasts as well as European dishes a la carte.There also is a pub. There is a bike-and-walk track in front of the hotel that runs along the seashore and leads to Gdańsk, Sopot, or Gdynia. Back at Lival Hotel, there is a sauna available to guests. It takes just 30 minutes to reach Gdańsk Airport. PGE Arena is 3 km away.

name: Hotel Number One by Grano
description: Located in the Old Town district in Gdańsk, 500 metres from Green Gate, Hotel Number One offers a restaurant and a lobby which feature design interiors. Free WiFi is propvided throughout the property and there is a paid private parking on site. Every spacious room at this hotel is air conditioned and is fitted with a flat-screen satellite TV. The bathroom comes with free toiletries and a hairdryer. Some units feature a seating area where you can relax. Guests at Hotel Number One enjoy free access to the wellness area including a swimming pool, a dry and a steam sauna and a gym, which are all located in a separate building within the hotel complex. A massage and spa treatments are provided at surcharge. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. There is also a bar available where guests can enjoy a drink. Long Market is 500 metres from Hotel Number One, while Marina Gdańsk is 500 metres away. The nearest airport is Gdansk Lech Walesa Airport, 13 km from Hotel Number One.

name: ibis Gdansk Stare Miasto
description: The ibis Gdansk Stare Miasto hotel is located just outside the Old Town and only a short walk away from St. Mary's Church, Neptune's Fountain and Zuraw Crane. The hotel is just 437 yards (400 m) from the Gdansk Glowny Railway Station and lies across the s treet from the City Terminal for the airport. It offers two meeting rooms and 120 rooms, all featuring the modern Sweet Room design with extremely comfortable Sweet Bed bedding. The fashionable Avanzi restaurant and bar is a perfect meeting place.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Mercure Gdansk Posejdon
description: Mercure Gdansk Posejdon is located in greenery just 100 m from the beach in Jelitkowo, Gdansk recreational area. The proximity of Sopot pier, bike paths and green areas provide great opportunities to relax. The location of the hotel allows easy access to important office buildings in Oliwa. Hotel offers 151 rooms and the Winestone Restaurant, serving a rich selection of wines and unique dishes.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Almond Business & Spa
description: Featuring a indoor pool available free of charge and set upon Motława River in the Old Town district in Gdańsk, 300 metres from National Museum, Hotel Almond Gdańsk boasts air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi throughout the property. Private parking is available on site. All modern rooms here include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some rooms include a seating area for your convenience. Each room has a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find bath robes, slippers and free toiletries. Hotel Almond features a two-level Magiel restaurant that specializes in regional dishes and guests can enjoy live-cooking of their food or picturesque views of the river. There is also a lobby bar. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. The property features a spa and wellness zone with a dry and steam sauna and a hot tub. Spa treatments and massages are available at a surcharge. Green Gate is 600 metres from Hotel Almond Gdańsk, while Long Market is 600 metres away. The nearest airport is Gdansk Lech Walesa Airport, 12 km from Hotel Almond Gdańsk.

name: Marina Club Hotel
description: Enjoying a prime location in the centre of Gdańsk, Marina Club Hotel Old Town is by the Gdańsk Marina and within a few minutes' walk of the Old Town's main sights. Rooms and suites at this 3 star hotel will provide you with a flat-screen TV and air conditioning. Fitted with a shower, private bathrooms also come with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Extras include a desk, a safety deposit box and a laptop safe. Some units come with kitchenettes. Other facilities offered include luggage storage. At an extra charge, monitored parking is available upon prior request. The hotel is within 1 km of the Gdańsk's attractions such as the Basilica of Saint Mary or the Prison Tower and Torture Chamber. The Gdańsk Główny Train Station is 1.6 km away.

name: Puro Gdansk Stare Miasto
description: Puro Gdansk Stare Miasto is located in the centre of Gdańsk, just 150 metres from the Green Gate and 300 metres from the Long Market. The property boasts a restaurant and offers free WiFi access and free bikes. Each room at this modern hotel is air conditioned and equipped with an an iPad and a flat-screen TV. Featuring a shower, the private bathrooms come with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Guests can enjoy hot beverages free of charge. Puro Gdansk Stare Miasto provides express check-in and check-out service, as well as a 24-hour front desk and meeting facilities. Services such as laundry and ironing are available. For those interested in sightseeing, the hotel is 350 metres from Artus Court, 400 metres from Main Town Hall and 1.2 km from the National Museum. Gdansk Lech Walesa Airport is 17 km away.

name: Hotel Beethoven
description: Situated 2 km from Gdańsk Old Town, Hotel Beethoven features a ground floor winter garden and rooms with free Wi-Fi and an LCD TV. Free underground monitored parking is provided, as well as free outdoor parking. Each room comes with cable TV, a work desk and a bathroom with a shower. Tea/coffee making set is also there, as well as free mineral water bottle. A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the dining room and can also be ordered to the room. Guests can buy snacks or drinks at the front desk bar. With early check-out, take away breakfast is also available. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can provide tourist information as well as recommend events happening in Gdansk during Your stay. Hotel Beethoven is located 2.4 km from Gdańsk Railway Station and 1.6 km from the Gdańsk Science and Technology Park. PGE Arena Gdańsk is 5 km away, and the Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa Airport is within 11 km.

name: Lofty Kampus Garnizon
description: Providing city views, a shared lounge and free WiFi, Lofty Kampus Garnizon is located in Gdańsk, 1.1 km from Gdansk Zaspa and 3.6 km from Olivia Hall. There is a fully equipped private bathroom with walk-in shower and free toiletries. Oliwa Cathedral is 5.1 km from the aparthotel, while Gdansk Central Station is 5.4 km away. The nearest airport is Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa Airport, 7 km from Lofty Kampus Garnizon.

name: Hotel Platan
description: Situated in Gdańsk, 4 km from Gdansk Lipce, Hotel Platan features accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. Built in 2019, this 3-star hotel is within 7.5 km of St. Nicholas Roman Catholic Church and 7.6 km of Crane over the Motława River. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a minibar, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. All rooms have a private bathroom, a hairdryer and bed linen. A continental, American or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. The hotel offers a sun terrace. Gdansk Central Station is 7.9 km from Hotel Platan, while National Maritime Museum is 8.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

name: Scsk Brzezno
description: SCSK Brzeźno is located in a quiet area of Gdańsk, 800 metres from the Baltic Sea. It offers free on-site parking and bright rooms with free Wi-Fi, an electric kettle and a flat-screen TV. All rooms at the Brzeźno are classically decorated and come with a bathroom with a shower. Each has a work desk. Some feature a refrigerator. Breakfast buffet is served every morning in the restaurant, which offers Polish and European dishes. Banquet facilities are also available. PGE Arena Stadium and Amber Expo International Fair Centre are 2.5 km from SCSK Brzeźno. Ergo Arena Stadium is 4 km away. There is a direct tram to Main Railway Station in Gdańsk and it takes about 20 minutes to get there from the property.

name: Dwie Motlawy
description: No description found

name: Villa Baltycka
description: No description found

name: Hotel Cztery Brzozy
description: Hotel Cztery Brzozy is located by an express route S6, within walking distance from popular shopping malls. It offers elegant rooms with free Wi-Fi and a spacious bathroom with shower. Each room at Cztery Brzozy includes a 32-inch flat-screen TV and a work desk. There is also a telephone and 220 cm long beds. Hotel Cztery Brzozy includes a 24-hour front desk service. The Gdańsk downtown is 7.9 km away. The Tricity bypass is 200 metres away. Private and monitored parking is available for free.

name: Yacht Club Residence Sopot
description: Yacht Club Residence Sopot is situated only 10 metres from the beach and offers rooms with private bathroom facilities. There is a sailing club on site, offering windsurfing lessons. Yacht Club Residence Sopot features a sauna available at a surcharge and upon reservation at the reception. Private parking is possible on site. Windsurfing school operates in the summer. Yacht Club Residence Sopot is located 1.6 km from the Gdańsk Żabianka SKM City Rail Station and 2 km from the popular Bohaterów Monte Cassino Street.
